ModMetaData.name: LLARoMdev
ModMetaData.author: albinogod
ModMetaData.description: This is a full integration patch for A Rimworld of Magic and Life Lessons. Spells, classes, rituals, and may other things have been adjusted to work in a logically obtuse way. Your master mages will need years of research to call forth powerful spells at their full potential, and your skilled warriors will be able to make use of their training.
